title: Making tennis a misdemeanor | Today, Explained in 10
description:
More than half of US states are working to ban, or even criminalize, trans athletes playing sports. Vox contributor Katelyn Burns explains how conservative politicians came to care so much about women’s sports.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
itunes:title: Making tennis a misdemeanor | Today, Explained in 10
itunes:author: Vox
itunes:subtitle: The proposals are the latest in a series of anti-trans policies pushed by GOP legislators in recent years
